definition: a supplementary component that improves capability, add to the very end
details:
noun
- a supplementary component that improves capability
= synonyms: accessory
- a quantity added (e.g. to make up for a deficiency)
= synonyms: supplementation
- textual matter that is added onto a publication
= synonyms: addendum, postscript
verb
- add to the very end
= synonyms: affix, add on, append
- add as a supplement to what seems insufficient
= example: add as a supplement to what seems insufficient
- to serve as a supplement to
= example: to serve as a supplement to
